page.title: 03ARROW AIR SERVICES
page.content: {Arrow Air Services}is based at {Shipdham airfield.}They have three aircraft which they use for flight training,a Beagle Pup,a Cesna 150 and a Cherokee. Lessons cost Â£42.55 per hour. They also hold a large stock of Tiger Moth spares and a long term project is the restoration of their 12 Tiger Moth aircraft. A large variety of visiting aircraft use{Arrow's facilities. They are licenced to maintain aircraft up to 2700kgs. An annual service costs about Â£1,000.They provide storage space for private aircraft and they are also an important local refuelling station. They have two hard surface runways,150 feet wide and 3,000 feet long and a 120 by 90ft hangar. There is a private club on site, run by{Arrow,}with a restaurant and bar.
